duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative support and assist in executing store operations, policies, and procedures
Handle inbound calls and greet customers in a professional and engaging manner
Support the sales function by providing assistance as directed by Management; ensure visual standards and displays are maintained throughout the day
Maintain office systems, data management, and written communication to clients via Email; handle cash desk operations
Support stock process by completing back-of-house operational tasks; maintain selling binders and reports
Assist in managing repairs and reports on a weekly basis; update employee picks log and staff discount log as requested
Assist the stock team in maintaining organization and orderliness at all times; verify Customer Agreement Forms; maintain waitlists
Order spare parts, replacement heels, and boutique supplies; assist with unpacking stock and keeping the stock room clean

education_certification.credential: 0-2 years of experience in Luxury Sales or similar role
